title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 9 Scholar Program is crafted to guide students through one of the most pivotal academic years. It aligns with the full school curriculum — providing comprehensive support for board-oriented preparation, subject mastery, project execution, and long-form assessments. The program strengthens conceptual clarity and helps learners manage academic pressure through structured routines and intelligent study strategies.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Mathematics, Science (Physics, Chemistry, Biology), Social Science (History, Civics, Geography, Economics), Computer Science, and Value Education.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Full support for assignments, internal assessments, practicals, and long-answer writing
- Smart revision plans, concept maps, doubt-clearing formats, and skill-building exercises
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard to monitor preparation progress and exam confidence
- Merit Badges for time management, academic discipline, and subject excellence
- Helps students transition smoothly into board exam patterns with confidence and clarity

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
In Class 9, CodeVoyagers advances into real-world tech application and structured problem-solving using trending technologies. Students explore AI models, basic Python programming, HTML/CSS projects, web design logic, data analytics, and automation principles — all in a highly practical, age-appropriate format.

The goal is to help learners start building meaningful digital tools and solutions — with mentorship and real project exposure.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Introduction to Python basics, HTML/CSS structure, AI tools, and digital design
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault featuring real-world logic structures and flow-based reasoning
- Projects include portfolio sites, chatbot concepts, creative automation, and digital presentations
- Parent+Child Dashboard to track development in logical fluency, creativity, and tech innovation
- Prepares students for hackathons, Olympiads, and entry-level real-world coding fluency

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 9 program is designed to elevate expressive power in both spoken and written English. Learners work on debate readiness, formal writing formats (reports, articles, notices), grammar mastery, and fluent public speaking. The focus is on clarity, structure, persuasive tone, and personal voice — all with accent polishing and creative confidence.

Optional multilingual integration adds global awareness and flexibility in communication.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Strong focus on stage presence, accent clarity, voice modulation, and persuasion
- Formal writing formats: reports, articles, speech, essay, and grammar perfection
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! sessions to build real-world verbal authority
- Optional multi language training - may it be French, German, or any other..
- Builds academic strength, public presentation mastery, and global linguistic flexibility

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
Class 9 MathMagicians builds high-school-level problem-solving with real-world application. The program reinforces key board-level concepts while also exposing students to deeper math logic through puzzles, simulations, and Olympiad-aligned formats. From algebra and geometry to statistics and coordinate graphs — math becomes a tool for real, structured thinking.

This is math for future leaders — sharp, strategic, and smart.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Covers algebraic identities, linear equations, probability, statistics, and coordinate geometry
- Brain Gym with case-based logic, real-life applications, and visual math challenges
- Projects include business math, data science basics, logic circuits, and real budget planning
- Merit Badges for higher-order thinking, competitive problem-solving, and abstract reasoning
- Builds board-level readiness while nurturing a love for practical and strategic mathematics
